# responsible_audit_token

**Instance Property**

The audit token of the process responsible for this process.

## Declaration

```swift
var responsible_audit_token: audit_token_t
```

## Discussion

The responsible process may be this process itself, if there’s no responsible process or the responsible process already exited.

This field is only available if the message [doc://com.apple.endpointsecurity/documentation/EndpointSecurity/es_message_t/version] is `4` or greater.

## Inspecting Audit Tokens

- **parent_audit_token**: The audit token of the parent process.

items.description: The audit token of the parent process.
